text: Muskeg River Mine (MRM) Cogeneration Station is a natural gas-fired station owned by Heartland Generation, located 75 km north of Fort McMurray and is part of the Albian Sands Project. == Description == The MRM Cogeneration Station consists of:Plant Description * 2 - GE 7EA gas-fired turbine and generator sets with low nitrous oxide burners * 2 - Heat recovery steam generators * 2 - Standby auxiliary gas-fired boilers. ==References== == External links == * SaskPower Station Description Category:Natural gas-fired power stations in Alberta Category:ATCO Category:SaskPower Category:Regional Municipality of Wood Buffalo
title: Muskeg River Mine Cogeneration Station
